name: Starblaze
description:
Story 

Alert! Imminent Cosmic Blast! Lift-off your spaceship and try to escape the wave through the asteroid field.

Controls 
  • A and D - move left and right
Context 

This is a submission for Mini Jam #128 with "Health" as an inspirational topic and "The only way to go is up" as a mandatory limitation.

StarBlaze implements the limitation by making sure that the player is constantly moving up in space towards and through an asteroid field, the best way to escape the cosmic blast. The topic still present as your goal is to keep your ship "alive", not only by avoid crashing into an asteroid, but also by maintaining the constantly draining fuel level.

Credits
  • Programming: Serlecu
  • Art: Tymofii
  • Sound: Marcelo Moraes (Instagram: @mafernando83)
